body.name: Lubriderm Advanced Therapy Fragrance Free Moisturizing Hand & Body Lotion + Pro-Ceramide with Vitamins E & Pro-Vitamin B5, Intense Hydration for Itchy, Extra Dry Skin, Non-Greasy, 16 fl. oz
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 1 hr 46 mins
features: 16-fluid ounce bottle of Lubriderm Advanced Therapy Fragrance-Free Daily Moisturizing Lotion + Pro-Ceramide with Vitamin E and Pro-Vitamin B5 itchy, extra-dry skin to help strengthen skin’s moisture barrier

Specially designed unscented lotion intensely hydrates itchy, extra-dry skin. The soothing formula of the body lotion with Pro-Ceramide penetrates within skin's surface to deliver 48-hour clinically proven moisturization

Body lotion is formulated with vitamins E and Pro-Vitamin B5 which moisturizes to help strengthen skin's moisture barrier. The non-greasy lotion transforms itchy, extra-dry skin into healthier looking, more resilient skin
Clinically- and dermatologist-tested lotion is hypoallergenic and fragrance free. The daily hand and body moisturizer suitable for sensitive skin is formulated free of parabens, phthalates and dyes
Lubriderm, a dermatologist developed, advanced therapy lotion absorbs quickly and leaves a clean, non-greasy feel. To use, smooth on hands and body daily or as directed by a physician
body.description: Lubriderm Advanced Therapy Fragrance-Free Daily Moisturizing Lotion + Pro-Ceramide intensely hydrates and helps relieve itchy, extra-dry skin. From a dermatologist-developed brand, this fragrance-free moisturizing lotion provides 48-hour clinically proven hydration and helps strengthen skin's moisture barrier for more resilient skin. The soothing formula of this non-greasy lotion is suitable for sensitive skin and contains Pro-Vitamin B5 and Vitamin E to moisturize and transform itchy, dry skin into healthier-looking skin. The fast-absorbing formula of this hypoallergenic body lotion has been clinically, and dermatologist tested and is free of parabens, phthalates and dyes. To use, smooth on hands and body daily or as directed. Advanced Therapy Lotion + Pro-Ceramide for extra-dry skin from Lubriderm, a dermatologist developed brand.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Compare Our Products Advanced Therapy Lotion Daily Moisture Lotion Daily Moisture FF Lotion Intense Skin Repair Advanced Therapy Wash Daily Moisture Wash Skin Type Itchy, Extra-Dry Skin All Skin Types All Skin Types Rough, Dry Skin Itchy, Dry Skin All Skin Types Key Ingredients Vitamin E and Pro-Vitamin B5 Shea Butter and Glycerin Shea Butter and Glycerin Vitamin E and Minerals Vitamin E and Pro-Vitamin B5 Shea Butter Clinically Proven Hydration 48 Hours 24 Hours 24 Hours 48 Hours When Paired with Lotion When Paired with Lotion Pro-Ceramide Technology ✔ ✔ ✔ ✔ ✔ ✔ Suitable for Body + Face ✔ ✔ ✔ ✔ ✘ ✔ Suitable for Sensitive Skin ✔ ✔ ✔ ✔ ✔ ✔ Hypoallergenic ✔ ✘ ✘ ✔ ✔ ✔ Allergy Tested ✔ ✔ ✔ ✔ ✔ ✔ Fragrance-Free ✔ ✘ ✔ ✔ ✔ ✘ Parabens, Phthalates and Dyes ✘ ✘ ✘ ✘ ✘ ✘

My bottle looks different, did Lubriderm change their packaging? Yes, you may have noticed that we have updated our packaging to showcase our new & improved formula with Pro-Ceramide. This exciting change reflects our commitment to delivering high-quality products. You may receive either design. Did Lubriderm change their formulas? Yes, Lubriderm has made some exciting changes to enhance our products! We have improved our formulas including the addition of Pro-Ceramide, but don’t worry-our lotions are still fast-absorbing with a clean, non-greasy feel. What is Pro-Ceramide and why is it important? Pro-Ceramide has been shown to penetrate within skin’s surface layers and help support your skin’s natural Ceramide levels. Ceramides play a role in helping maintain a healthy moisture barrier which helps retain moisture within your skin’s surface. Is Lubriderm lotion safe for use on tattoos? Experts recommend using a water-based lotion to hydrate tattooed skin. Lubriderm Daily Moisture Lotion Fragrance Free is a gentle, water-based, unscented lotion that quickly absorbs and moisturizes for healthy-looking skin. Which Lubriderm lotion is best for winter skin? Dry, winter air coupled with heat indoors can lead to very dry skin. Intensely moisturizing products such as Lubriderm Advanced Therapy Moisturizing Cream Fragrance-Free replenish extra dry skin and help to restore your skin's moisture barrier.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Finally, No Scent
reviews.reviewText: I am a Nivea lover, but the fragrance gets to me, even what they call unscented. So, when I saw the Lubriderm Unscented, I thought I would try it. Used Lubriderm years ago and, frankly, had completely forgotten about it. Well, this was a pleasant surprise! Absolutely no scent!!! This lotion with the pump top comes out thick like Greek yogurt. A little dab the size of a pea is enough for both hands and it is wonderful. Not sticky nor slippery, either. Goes on smooth and works into skin to leave hands or the rest of body silky soft. 16 ounces is a great value, too. My husband loves it because it has no scent and smooths his rough hands.

Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Keeps you moisturized.
reviews.reviewText: Love this product. I use this as a substitute when i can get to eucerin. I have very itchy skin and it helps
I have really really really dry skin and this cream does wonders and keeps it moisturized for a very long time. Would recommend especially during those cold months when your skin gets really dry!
Hab sie erst paar Tage , die zieht schneller ein als meine ex. Dazu riecht sie auch angenehmer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 15, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Moisturisers seem to be quite specific to a person's skin type. Having tried many brands on my arms which get itchy particularly in the cold, I came across Lubriderm one freezing winter in New York. I was so pleased to discover once back home in the UK that I could get hold of the same product. This is a very effective product which works very well for me.
Es muy buena crema. La mejor para la piel masculina sin el típico olor de otras cremas humectantes.
